name: First Words Memory Cards Free by Tabbydo: Twinmatch learning game for Kids & Toddlers
name_original: First Words Memory Cards Free by Tabbydo: Twinmatch learning game for Kids & Toddlers
description:
Let your child exercise his memory, focus and concentration with First words memory cards game. Learn, play and discover Colors, Shapes, Vegetables and Fruits with hundreds of fun and unique non-ending combination of game levels.

Features :

- Bundled with 4 categories : Colors, Shapes, Fruits and Vegetables
- Hundreds of Fun and unique non-ending game levels
- Match the Cards, Earn stars and points
- Child friendly interface, tested with Parents & kids for kids :)

**Lite version comes with additional purchasing of Memory Cards game"

If you find any difficulty in using the app or you have any feedback for improving the app features, please write to us at tabbydogames@gmail.com

Like us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/tabbydogames
